name: Cauliflower Queso Soup
description: Thank you, Kelly Macht, for this 3-ingredient recipe!

ingredients.name: Ooey Gooey Queso Hot Dip Mix

preparation: Chop cauliflower into bite-sized pieces; place in large Multipurpose Pot. Add broth; bring to a boil and simmer until cauliflower is tender, about 15 min.
Using a blender or immersion blender, puree. Return to pot. Stir in hot dip mix. Return to a simmer for about 5 min to allow flavour to meld.
Stir in cream, if desired. Ladle into bowls and add additional toppings, if desired.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Ooey Gooey Queso Dip Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Just say no to fake cheese and whip up this amazing hot dip for your next get-together or taco night. With a blend of Tex-Mex spices, this real food blend creates a silky-smooth hot dip that’s packed with flavor.
